thread.title: BRIEF-Galatasaray Agrees With Stoke City To Sell Football Player Papa Alioune Ndiaye At Eur 16.0 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Galatasaray Agrees With Stoke City To Sell Football Player Papa Alioune Ndiaye At Eur 16.0 Mln
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Galatasaray:
* AGREES WITH STOKE CITY FC TO SELL FOOTBALL PLAYER PAPA ALIOUNE NDIAYE AT EUR 16.0 MILLION
* STOKE CITY TO PAY 15 PERCENT OF PROFIT ON SALE TO GALATASARAY IF THEY SELL PAPA ALIOUNE NDIAYE TO ANOTHER CLUB
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
